item.title: Services
item.description: The overarching theme of our service is in the unique point of contact we offer to our clients to assist in their project in the country. Our service differs depending on the client and the project : we can work and develop green field projects and we can provide assistance on brown field projects (research of new funds, help in government relations, …)
